entry.title: For a conversion from SAP ECC to S4Hana Private cloud - do we need BTP/Integration suite also ? Can
entry.content:
For a conversion from SAP ECC to S4Hana Private cloud - do we need BTP/Integration suite also ?

Can we integrate S4Hana private cloud with external systems(Hosted on internet), External systems(private network) and client internal network directly. 

1. High level design of how this can be achieved? 

2. What are the pros and cons of this strategy?

entry.title: BOm component Validation
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We are validating BOM components using user exit PCSD0005.
In CS02, when we add a new component in Alternative BOM 1, the system throws an error Duplicate component not allowed.

However, Alternative BOM 1 does NOT have this component.
The duplicate component exists only in Alternative BOM 2.

We need to validate the component based on the correct Alternative BOM (STLAL) only.

I_RC29P contains the field STLAL, but it is always initial (empty) inside the user exit.

How can we correctly get the STLAL value in PCSD0005 for proper validation?

entry.title: Are These SAP Authorizations Strictly Read-Only?
entry.content:
Can someone confirm whether the following SAP authorizations are strictly read-only, or if any of them allow update or modification operations?

Authorization Object: S_RFC

RFC_TYPE: Function Module

RFC_NAME: *

Activity: Execute

Authorization Object: /SDF/E2E

Activity: 03

Authorization Object: S_ADMI_FCD

S_ADMI_FCD: ST0R

Authorization Object: S_RZL_ADM

Activity: 03

Authorization Object: S_TABU_DIS

DICBERCLS: &NC&, EDI0, SA, SC, SS, SPWD

Activity: 03

 

Thanks,

Chinmayi G Panicker

entry.title: Why does SY-FDPOS return 0 when using CO even if the condition is TRUE?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I’m experimenting with ABAP string operations and observed something that I don’t fully understand. Consider the following code:

DATA : lv_ipt1(20) TYPE c VALUE 'System Application',
       lv_ipt2(20) TYPE c VALUE 'System Application'.

IF lv_ipt1 CO lv_ipt2.
  WRITE : 'TRUE', SY-FDPOS.
ELSE.
  WRITE: 'FALSE', SY-FDPOS.
ENDIF.

  • Here, lv_ipt1 CO lv_ipt2 evaluates to TRUE as expected.

  • However, SY-FDPOS prints 0.

    I thought SY-FDPOS would return the length of lv_ipt1 (20) if the condition is true.


    Any clarification or best practice would be really helpful.

    Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: how divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis sap fiori app
entry.content: How divested consolidation unit is not coming in group data analysis and group data analysis with reporting sap fiori app. In cds C_CnsldtnRpt30Q, C_CnsldtnRpt40Q and cds P_CnsldtnGroupJrnlEntrItm there are no such checks related to divesture. Table fincs_grpstr is used no where in cds as this table field LYEAR and LPERI fields related to divesture. So how exactly consolidation units which are divested are not coming. What is the logic behind this?

entry.title: PROBLEM USE BADI
entry.content:
Hi, All

We have special requirements for the products we provide to certain customers. We created different BOMs and production versions, and then used the BADI MD_PLDORD_CHANGE to change the production version of the planned order to the new version during MD01/MD02 runs, per customer. I found that it did work—the planned order's production version was changed, but the order's components still used the components from the default BOM, not from the new BOM. How can this issue be resolved? Do we need to set any special parameters?

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: RAP DETERMINATION handler METHOD stuck in Infinite recursive calls to itself because of MODIFY EML
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

The issue we are facing is exactly the same as,

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/determination-on-save-infinite-loop-issue-rap/qaq-p/12784660

and unfortunately we had to go with the same workaround, which doesn't seems to be legit approach. And as mentioned over one of the comments there, I also have the same concern,

Details of the issue we are facing : 

Below 3 fields are part of the RAP BO we have,

In the Behavior Definition we have maintained a DETERMINATION for the OnHoldQuantity field changes as shown below,

// determination set_allocation_status on save { update; create; field Allocation_In_hand, status; }

  determination set_allocation_status on save { update; create; field OnHoldQuantity; }

And below is the Implementation of this DETERMINATION handler METHOD set_allocation_status.

It can be noted that as part of this MODIFY EML we are modifying only allocation_in_hand and status fields of the Entity.

But once the Execution Control reaches this MODIFY EML, again it calls back the DETERMINATION code which we have maintained for OnHoldQuantity field and this cycle continues indefinitely. 

Even though we fixed this issue as per the workaround mentioned in the referenced thread, buy making use of a Helper Class with a Static Attribute which acts as a flag for the MODIFY action executed at first place. 

But, this doesn't seem to be a legit workaround and rather I guess we need to have some Syntax addition using which we can tell the system that it should be executed only once.

Equally Strange is that even though the DETERMINATION is set for OnHoldQuantity field and in the MODIFY EML we are changing other fields still this DETERMINATION meant for OnHoldQuantity field is getting triggered.

If I am missing anything here, requesting to pour in your thoughts.

Helpful suggestions much appreciated.

Thanks,

Sijin

entry.title: Adding additional columns in WLF_IDOC ALV List
entry.content:
We have a requirement where we need to add additional columns( for example, column material number) to the ALV List that comes in the second screen of Tcode WLF_IDOC. These columns need to be filled by data from segments( for example, 'ZMaterial' from segment) of the IDOC, and if a certain segment does not exist we keep it blank.

I have found a Enhancement Spot 'WLF_IDOC_PROCESSING' .  I found the below BADI with the description can be used to change fields in ALV LIST. 

I tried implementing the above BADI but it is not getting triggered. I made it the default implementation but still the implementation is not getting called. 

I need to add the columns and then fill the field with the values. 

Can  somebody please suggest a solution ?

ABAP Development  SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP, version for SAP HANA SAP ERP

entry.title: Position... button in maintenance view doesn't show error message, if entry doesn't exist?
entry.content:
Hello,w

we've a maintenance view, which has the route (TVRO-ROUTE) as first (primary) key field.
The table/view contains the following entries:
1. 13300
2. 13301
3. 13302
4. 13303
...
If we now use the "Position..." button and we're entering the route "133012" in the positioning popup, the cursor ist set to the 3rd entry with route "13302". As no entry with route "133012" exists we want a message that no entry w/ the entered value exists instead of positioning the cursor to the next similiar line!?

I've debugged the corresponding coding and found the  place in include LSVIMF3I, form POPUP_POSITIONIEREN:

 ELSE.
*    READ TABLE extract WITH KEY <f1> BINARY SEARCH
*                                     TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS.
    READ TABLE extract WITH KEY <f1_x> BINARY SEARCH                "#EC WARNOK
                                       TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS.
    nextline = sy-tabix.
    CLEAR old_nl.                                           "GKPR - 0001009660
    IF sy-subrc = 8 AND nextline GT 1.
      nextline = nextline - 1.                              "last entry
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

It seems, that in older releases an error message was shown, if the entry didn't exist (you can check the notes 2568668 - SM30 does not provide expected error message when using Position Button or 2583844 - SM30 Position Button Error ) and we would like to have this old behavior back.

Does perhaps somebody has the same problem, is it a bug or is the new functionality desired by SAP?

Thanks & regards
Daniel

entry.title: /UI5/UI5_INFRA_APP/REP_DT_PUT Virus Scan Profile in SAP Note 3473195
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

Would like to ask about this SAP Note 3473195 from this link https://me.sap.com/notes/3473195. It says on the resolution that deactivate the profile /UI5/UI5_INFRA_APP/REP_DT_PUT.

I don’t know what kind of ‘deactivate the profile’ this note is referring to. What I did was simply untick the Active checkbox on its profile.

Is this the right way to deactivate the profile mentioned on the note? If no, what would be the step?

Thank you.

entry.title: Best way of providing a clean/plain REST interface?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We want to develop new interfaces that we would like to offer (like almost everyone else) via REST interface. I am aware that I can develop this with ABAP RAP, but only the OData standard is offered here, and this is not always suitable or too inflexible.

We would like to develop “plain/clean REST APIs.” Is there a “best way” to do this, or is it only possible using SICF and the abap if_http_extension interface?

We don't want ODATA—just a pure JSON REST service.

Thanks for any information and tips!

entry.content:

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/sap-btp-abap-environment-and-adt-troubleshooting-guide/ba-p/13527967

entry.title: authentication keeps failing in sapse/abap-cloud-developer-trial:2023
entry.content:
I successfully ran the docker image for sapse/abap-cloud-developer-trial:2023. When it is run,all the processes generally don't get started automatiacally but have to be started manually.  

/usr/local/sbin/rcscc_daemon start,

 /usr/local/bin/abaptrialinit -start-as,

/usr/local/bin/abaptrialinit -start-db etc. etc.

But authentication with DEVELOPER/ABAPtr2023#00  at https://vhcala4hci:8443/ keeps failing as if it is wrong password. What am I missing?

entry.title: RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL values
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I need help on how to export the values of RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL to the custom include ZXCSAU10.
The requirement is to validate BOM components in CS02.
Currently, the value of I_RC29P-STLAL is initial in ZXCSAU10, so I need to import the RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL value into the include.

Could you please provide the include name for implicit or explicit enhancement in CS01.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: SOST - Subject translation issue
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

We have sent an email via QM01. The subject is fetched from SO10 text and has been maintained in three languages.

In English logon, the subject appears correctly. However, when I log on in another language, the subject is displayed as the default “Email triggering for notification”.

The text is being read using READ_TEXT with SY-LANGU.

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

entry.title: Issue for 261 while confirmation using BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR
entry.content:
Hi, 
I am doing confirmation using the function module BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR for process order and have selected for backflushing.
But only 101 is done, and 261 is not.
 
Below are the data I am passing :-
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO athdrlevels ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<athdrlevels>).
 <athdrlevels>-orderid    = lv wet_cake_order.
 <athdrlevels>-fin_conf   = abap_true.
 <athdrlevels>-clear_res  = abap_true.
 <athdrlevels>-postg_date = sy-datum.
 <athdrlevels>-conf_text  = 'Auto confirmed'.
 <athdrlevels>-yield = v_calc_qty.
 
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO goodsmovements ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<goodsmovements>).
 <goodsmovements>-material  = is_resb-matnr.
 <goodsmovements>-plant     = ls_order_header-werks.
 <goodsmovements>-move_type = '101'.
 <goodsmovements>-entry_qnt = lv_calc_qty.
 <goodsmovements>-orderid   = 1v_wet_cake_order.
 <goodsmovements>-mvt_ind   = 'F'.
 
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO link_conf_goodsmov ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<link_conf_goodsmov>).
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_confirm = '1'. 
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_gm_depend = '1'.
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_goodsmov = '1'.
 
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR'        "#EC CI_USAGE_OK[2438131]
   EXPORTING
post_wrong_entries = '2'
   IMPORTING
return = ls_return
   TABLES
athdrlevels = athdrlevels
goodsmovements = goodsmovements
link_conf_goodsmov = link_conf_goodsmov
detail_return = detail_return.
 
IF NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'A' ] ) AND
   NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'E' ] ) AND
   NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'X' ] ).
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI TRANSACTION COMMIT
  EXPORTING
wait abap_true.
ENDIF.
 
Suggest any changes or need to add anythig else.
 
Regards 
jitendra

entry.title: ABAP ZXLWB_CALLFORM - Export Two Separate Data Sections in One Excel
entry.content:
##I have an ABAP report (ZMMHR003) that needs to export data to Excel using ZXLWB_CALLFORM. 
The data contains two vendors:1. Fixed vendor 104959 (always included)
2. Input vendor from selection screen (optional)

Current Structure:
- ZST_ZMMHR003_ITEM with all fields for both vendors
- Single table GT_OUTPUT contains mixed data

Requirement:
In Excel output, I need to show TWO SEPARATE SECTIONS:
- Section 1: Vendor 104959 data with header "I."
- Section 2: Vendor Input data with header "II."

Current Code Issue:
All data is mixed in one table, and ZXLWB template shows everything together.
